00028 public class ChangeSet {

00030     public enum RunStatus {
00031         NOT_RAN, ALREADY_RAN, RUN_AGAIN, INVALID_MD5SUM
00032     }
00033 
00034     private List<Change> changes;
00035     private String id;
00036     private String author;
00037     private String filePath = "UNKNOWN CHANGE LOG";
00038     private String physicalFilePath;
00039     private Logger log;
00040     private String md5sum;
00041     private boolean alwaysRun;
00042     private boolean runOnChange;
00043     private Set<String> contexts;
00044     private Set<String> dbmsSet;

00051     public boolean shouldAlwaysRun() {
00052         return alwaysRun;
00053     }

00055     public boolean shouldRunOnChange() {
00056         return runOnChange;

00058 
00059     public ChangeSet(String id, String author, boolean alwaysRun, boolean runOnChange, String filePath, String physicalFilePath, String contextList, String dbmsList) {
00060         this.changes = new ArrayList<Change>();
00061         log = LogFactory.getLogger();
00062         this.id = id;
00063         this.author = author;
00064         this.filePath = filePath;
00065         this.physicalFilePath = physicalFilePath;
00066         this.alwaysRun = alwaysRun;
00067         this.runOnChange = runOnChange;
00068         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(contextList) != null) {
00069             String[] strings = contextList.toLowerCase().split(",");
00070             contexts = new HashSet<String>();
00071             for (String string : strings) {
00072                 contexts.add(string.trim().toLowerCase());
00073             }
00074         }
00075         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(dbmsList) != null) {
00076             String[] strings = dbmsList.toLowerCase().split(",");
00077             dbmsSet = new HashSet<String>();
00078             for (String string : strings) {
00079                 dbmsSet.add(string.trim().toLowerCase());
00080             }
00081         }
00082     }
00083 
00084     public String getFilePath() {
00085         return filePath;
00086     }
00087 
00088     public String getPhysicalFilePath() {
00089         if (physicalFilePath == null) {
00090             return filePath;
00091         } else {
00092             return physicalFilePath;
00093         }
00094     }
00095 
00096     public String getMd5sum() {
00097         if (md5sum == null) {
00098             StringBuffer stringToMD5 = new StringBuffer();
00099             for (Change change : getChanges()) {
00100                 stringToMD5.append(change.getMD5Sum()).append(":");
00101             }
00102 
00103             md5sum = MD5Util.computeMD5(stringToMD5.toString());
00104         }
00105         return md5sum;
00106     }
00107 
00113     public void execute(Database database) throws MigrationFailedException {
00114 
00115         try {
00116             database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("Changeset " + toString());
00117             if (StringUtils.trimToNull(getComments()) != null) {
00118                 String comments = getComments();
00119                 String[] lines = comments.split("\n");
00120                 for (int i=0; i<lines.length; i++) {
00121                     if (i > 0) {
00122                         lines[i] = database.getLineComment()+" "+lines[i];
00123                     }
00124                 }
00125                 database.getJdbcTemplate().comment(StringUtils.join(Arrays.asList(lines), "\n"));
00126             }
00127 
00128             for (Change change : changes) {
00129                 try {
00130                     change.setUp();
00131                 } catch (SetupException se) {
00132                     throw new MigrationFailedException(this, se);
00133                 }
00134             }
00135 
00136             log.finest("Reading ChangeSet: " + toString());
00137             for (Change change : getChanges()) {
00138                 change.executeStatements(database);
00139                 log.finest(change.getConfirmationMessage());
00140             }
00141 
00142             database.commit();
00143             log.finest("ChangeSet " + toString() + " has been successfully ran.");
00144 
00145             database.commit();
00146         } catch (Exception e) {
00147             try {
00148                 database.rollback();
00149             } catch (Exception e1) {
00150                 throw new MigrationFailedException(this, e);
00151             }
00152             if (getFailOnError() != null && !getFailOnError()) {
00153                 log.log(Level.INFO, "Change set "+toString(false)+" failed, but failOnError was false", e);
00154             } else {
00155                 throw new MigrationFailedException(this, e);
00156             }
00157         }
00158     }
00159 
00160     public void rolback(Database database) throws RollbackFailedException {
00161         try {
00162             database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("Rolling Back ChangeSet: " + toString());
00163             if (rollBackStatements != null && rollBackStatements.length > 0) {
00164                 for (SqlStatement rollback : rollBackStatements) {
00165                     try {
00166                         database.getJdbcTemplate().execute(rollback);
00167                     } catch (JDBCException e) {
00168                         throw new RollbackFailedException("Error executing custom SQL [" + rollback.getSqlStatement(database) + "]", e);
00169                     }
00170                 }
00171 
00172             } else {
00173                 List<Change> changes = getChanges();
00174                 for (int i = changes.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
00175                     Change change = changes.get(i);
00176                     change.executeRollbackStatements(database);
00177                     log.finest(change.getConfirmationMessage());
00178                 }
00179             }
00180 
00181             database.commit();
00182             log.finest("ChangeSet " + toString() + " has been successfully rolled back.");
00183         } catch (Exception e) {
00184             throw new RollbackFailedException(e);
00185         }
00186 
00187     }
00188 
00192     public List<Change> getChanges() {
00193         return Collections.unmodifiableList(changes);
00194     }

00216     public String toString(boolean includeMD5Sum) {
00217         return filePath + " :: " + getId() + " :: " + getAuthor() + (includeMD5Sum ? (" :: (MD5Sum: " + getMd5sum() + ")") : "");
00218     }
00219

00221         return toString(true);

00231 
00232     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogDOM) {
00233         Element node = currentChangeLogDOM.createElement("changeSet");
00234         node.setAttribute("id", getId());
00235         node.setAttribute("author", getAuthor());
00236 
00237         if (alwaysRun) {
00238             node.setAttribute("alwaysRun", "true");
00239         }
00240 
00241         if (runOnChange) {
00242             node.setAttribute("runOnChange", "true");
00243         }
00244 
00245         if (failOnError != null) {
00246             node.setAttribute("failOnError", failOnError.toString());
00247         }
00248 
00249         if (getContexts() != null && getContexts().size() > 0) {
00250             StringBuffer contextString = new StringBuffer();
00251             for (String context : getContexts()) {
00252                 contextString.append(context).append(",");
00253             }
00254             node.setAttribute("context", contextString.toString().replaceFirst(",$", ""));
00255         }
00256 
00257         if (getDbmsSet() != null && getDbmsSet().size() > 0) {
00258             StringBuffer dbmsString = new StringBuffer();
00259             for (String dbms : getDbmsSet()) {
00260                 dbmsString.append(dbms).append(",");
00261             }
00262             node.setAttribute("dbms", dbmsString.toString().replaceFirst(",$", ""));
00263         }
00264 
00265         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(getComments()) != null) {
00266             Element commentsElement = currentChangeLogDOM.createElement("comment");
00267             Text commentsText = currentChangeLogDOM.createTextNode(getComments());
00268             commentsElement.appendChild(commentsText);
00269             node.appendChild(commentsElement);
00270         }
00271 
00272 
00273         for (Change change : getChanges()) {
00274             node.appendChild(change.createNode(currentChangeLogDOM));
00275         }
00276         return node;
00277     }
00278 
00279     public SqlStatement[] getRollBackStatements() {
00280         return rollBackStatements;
00281     }
00282 
00283     public void setRollBackSQL(String sql) {
00284         if (sql == null) {
00285             return;
00286         }
00287         String[] sqlStatements = sql.split(";");
00288         this.rollBackStatements = new SqlStatement[sqlStatements.length];
00289 
00290         for (int i = 0; i < rollBackStatements.length; i++) {
00291             rollBackStatements[i] = new RawSqlStatement(sqlStatements[i].trim());
00292         }
00293     }
00294 
00295     public boolean canRollBack() {
00296         if (rollBackStatements != null && rollBackStatements.length > 0) {
00297             return true;
00298         }
00299 
00300         for (Change change : getChanges()) {
00301             if (!change.canRollBack()) {
00302                 return false;
00303             }
00304         }
00305         return true;
00306     }
00307 
00308     public String getDescription() {
00309         List<Change> changes = getChanges();
00310         if (changes.size() == 0) {
00311             return "Empty";
00312         }
00313 
00314         StringBuffer returnString = new StringBuffer();
00315         Class<? extends Change> lastChangeClass = null;
00316         int changeCount = 0;
00317         for (Change change : changes) {
00318             if (change.getClass().equals(lastChangeClass)) {
00319                 changeCount++;
00320             } else if (changeCount > 1) {
00321                 returnString.append(" (x").append(changeCount).append(")");
00322                 returnString.append(", ");
00323                 returnString.append(change.getChangeName());
00324                 changeCount = 1;
00325             } else {
00326                 returnString.append(", ").append(change.getChangeName());
00327                 changeCount = 1;
00328             }
00329             lastChangeClass = change.getClass();
00330         }
00331 
00332         if (changeCount > 1) {
00333             returnString.append(" (x").append(changeCount).append(")");
00334         }
00335 
00336         return returnString.toString().replaceFirst("^, ", "");
00337     }
00338 
00339     public Boolean getFailOnError() {
00340         return failOnError;

00343     public void setFailOnError(Boolean failOnError) {
00344         this.failOnError = failOnError;
